AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fighters guild trainee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a trainee in the local Fighters Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught by the Guild how to hold [PAWN_possessive] own in personal combat, to hold [PAWN_possessive] weapon with confidence and dispatch [PAWN_possessive] enemies without prejudice.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: thieves guild trainee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the local Thieves Guild. [PAWN_pronoun] was orphaned as a child, but was taken in by the Guild and taught how to make a living... by stealing from others.
